## Predicting Province

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(formatR)
library(moderndive)
library(skimr)

wine_pinot <- readRDS(gzcon(url("https://github.com/karolo89/machine_learning_assignment/raw/main/pinot.rds")))
```

```{r}
summary(wine_pinot)
skim(wine_pinot)

#adding log price column
wine_pinot %>% 
  mutate(lprice = log(price))
```
